subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Top-ranked Serena Williams extended her career-best winning streak to 26 matches by beating a wild card, Caroline Garcia of France, 6-1, 6-2, at the French Open.
snippet: Top-ranked Serena Williams extended her career-best winning streak to 26 matches by beating a wild card, Caroline Garcia of France, 6-1, 6-2, at the French Open.
